loginUrl:
<js>
function Login() {
    Account = result['账号：'] ? result['账号：'] : source.getLoginInfoMap()["账号："];
    Password = result['密码：'] ? result['密码：'] : source.getLoginInfoMap()["密码："];
    Password = java.md5Encode(Password);
    if (Account == '' && Password == '') {
        login('【登录提示】' + '\n\n请输入账号和密码');
    } else if (Account == '') {
        login('【登录提示】' + '\n\n请输入账号');
    } else if (Password == '') {
        login('【登录提示】' + '\n\n请输入密码');
    } else {
        var pathname = source.bookSourceUrl + '/login.so';
        var method = "POST";
        //请求体：loginType=1&username=sunqaq&password=adca6ac23439695d1f317844c26ea535
        var requestBody = 'loginType=1&username=' + Account + '&password=' + Password;
        //请求头：使用源注释辅助生成
        var headers = "\{\"Content-Type\":\"application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=UTF-8\"\}";
        var option = {
            "method": String(method),
            "body": String(requestBody),
            "headers": String(headers)
        };
        Response = java.ajax(pathname + ',' + JSON.stringify(option));
        if (JSON.parse(Response).success == true) {
            java.log(Response);
            login('【登录提示】\n\n┏┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┓\n┋┋' + '\n' + Account + '\n┋┋' + '\n登录成功\n┋┋' + '\n┗┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┛');
        } else {
            java.log(Response);
            login('【登录提示】' + '\n' + Account + '\n登录失败\n\n请检查账号和密码');
        }
    }
}
function login(e) {
    if (e == undefined) {
        return;
    }
    java.longToast(e);
}
</js>

ruleBookInfo.tocUrl:
<js>
var str = result;
var match = str.match(/\$\(\"\#showCoverBtn\"\)\.attr\(\"href\", \"\/\/(.*?)\"/);
var mlurl = 'https:\/\/' + match[1] + ',{\"webView\":true}';
result = mlurl;
</js>

ruleContent.nextContentUrl:
<js>
var str = result;
var match1 = str.match(/window.location.href = \"(\/\/.*?)\"/);
var match3 = str.match(/\"disabled\">.*?\/(.*?)<\/button>/);
var xyyurl = [];
var link;
for (i = 1; i < match3[1]; i++) {
    link = 'https:' + match1[1] + i + ',{\"webView\":true}';
    xyyurl.push({ url: link });
}
JSON.stringify(xyyurl);
</js>
$.[*].url
